# Red hat developer studio
## camel-example-blueprint-rest-jdbc-swagger
An apache camel route using blueprint and fuse graphical editor, it's using these components/technologies
* Rest webservice endpoint (http://127.0.0.1:8096/swagger/rest/customer/{id})
* Fetch records into a H2 database 
* Marshal into json with jackson
* Using HirakiCP driver
* Api doc is automatically generated by swagger (http://127.0.0.1:8096/swagger/api-docs/camel_swagger)
